channel.title: CVE Feed for Juniper Networks -- 128 Technology Session Smart Router
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Juniper Networks -- 128 Technology Session Smart Router

item.title: CVE-2021-31349|2024-08-03T22:55:53.493Z -- juniper%20networks -- 128%20technology%20session%20smart%20router
item.description: The usage of an internal HTTP header created an authentication bypass vulnerability (CWE-287), allowing an attacker to view internal files, change settings, manipulate services and execute arbitrary code. This issue affects all Juniper Networks 128 Technology Session Smart Router versions prior to 4.5.11, and all versions of 5.0 up to and including 5.0.1.
